title: Game crashed during download
body:
I got a new Hard Drive, and a new internet device.
But I got to 81% of the game download, and the game crashed?
I'm on a prepaid data device, and I have no more data to download the game. 
So I've just practically thrown away $80. 

Is there anything you guys can do on your side of things?

replies.body:
Hey there,

>I'm on a prepaid data device, and I have no more data to download the game.
Is there anything you guys can do on your side of things?

Riot can't provide you more data, unfortunately you'll have to wait until you recharge again to complete the download.
